tool_description: Sets and manages temperature thresholds for different food categories and storage areas according to safety regulations.

location_type.description: Area type: refrigeration, freezer, hot_holding, cold_prep, serving_line, transport

food_category.description: Food type: dairy, meat, poultry, seafood, produce, frozen, prepared_hot, prepared_cold

warning_buffer.description: Degrees before threshold to trigger warning alert

regulation_source.description: Regulatory authority: FDA, USDA, local_code, HACCP_plan

time_limit_minutes.description: Maximum time food can remain outside safe temperature range

critical_control_point.description: Whether this threshold represents a critical control point

seasonal_adjustment.description: Whether thresholds should adjust for seasonal temperature variations

override_code.description: Authorization code for non-standard threshold settings

error_messages: Invalid location_type: Must be one of [refrigeration, freezer, hot_holding, cold_prep, serving_line, transport].
Invalid food_category: Must be one of [dairy, meat, poultry, seafood, produce, frozen, prepared_hot, prepared_cold].
Temperature range invalid: minimum_safe_temp must be less than maximum_safe_temp, both within -20째F to 200째F.
Warning_buffer out of range: Must be between 0.5째F and 10째F.
Invalid regulation_source: Must be one of [FDA, USDA, local_code, HACCP_plan].
Time_limit invalid: Must be positive integer between 1 and 1440 minutes (24 hours).
Threshold conflict: Specified thresholds conflict with mandatory regulatory requirements for this food/location combination.
Authorization required: Non-standard thresholds require valid override_code.
Seasonal adjustment error: Seasonal adjustments not supported for critical control points.
usage: Specify location_type, food_category, and safe temperature range. Configure warning_buffer, time limits, and regulatory compliance settings. Use override_code for non-standard configurations requiring management approval.

threshold_id.description: Unique identifier for this threshold configuration

active_thresholds.description: Array of active threshold values [min_warning, min_safe, max_safe, max_warning]

compliance_notes.description: Any regulatory compliance notes or warnings

effective_date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when configuration becomes active
